general_advisory: Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Choose the variety according to land type and resource available.
Choose quality seeds of mung and blackgram cultivation.
Treat the seeds with Rhizobium and Carbedazim before sowing.
Choose quality seeds of Arhar like Upas -120, ICPl 86012, Pusa Arhar.
Choose the good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava.
Choose good varieties like Kalinga Maize, Prabal, etc.
Apply the basal dose of NPK after final land preparation.
Choose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri -6, Kalinga groundnut.
Treat the seeds with Vitavax power and Rhizobium culture before sowing.
Drain out excess water from the field.
Drain out excess water from the field.
In case of Brinjal fruit & Shoot Borer use pheromone traps or Neem based pesticides.
Go for off season vegetables like Cauliflower.
Prepare the well pulverized field and make pits of 3 ft X 3 ft and of 1.5ft depth.
